plainStorybooks.title: The Lion and the Mouse
plainStorybooks.description: A heartwarming tale of friendship and discovery, teaching that even the smallest creatures can make a big impact.

plainStorybooks.description: A timeless story that teaches perseverance and patience—slow and steady wins the race.

plainStorybooks.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
plainStorybooks.description: A cautionary tale about the consequences of lying and how losing trust is hard to recover.

plainStorybooks.description: A story of how kindness and generosity are rewarded, even when it seems like a small act.

plainStorybooks.title: The Ant and the Grasshopper
plainStorybooks.description: This story teaches the importance of hard work and planning ahead, while warning against procrastination.

plainStorybooks.description: A moral story about hard work, responsibility, and the importance of sharing the rewards of effort.

plainStorybooks.title: Stone Soup
plainStorybooks.description: A heartwarming story that highlights the power of sharing and cooperation to create something wonderful.

plainStorybooks.title: The Ugly Duckling
plainStorybooks.description: A beautiful story about self-worth, inner beauty, and how everyone has the potential for greatness.

plainStorybooks.title: The Cunning Fox and The Crow
plainStorybooks.description: A fable about self-deception, teaching that it's easy to dismiss what we can't have as unimportant.

plainStorybooks.title: The Honest Woodcutter
plainStorybooks.description: A story that teaches the value of honesty, showing how doing the right thing brings greater rewards.

tagalogVideoStorybooks.title: Jungle Book

tagalogVideoStorybooks.title: Ang Unggoy at ang Buwaya

tagalogVideoStorybooks.title: Si Pinocchio
